Description: Normal 0 MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 ~ VERA BRADLEY ~ BACKPACK LARGE COLORBLOCK BACKPACK KATALINA SHOWERS Retired FEBRUARY 2016 New with Tags! Brand: Vera Bradley Style Name: Large Colorblock Backpack Style Description: Multi-compartment Backpack with Adjustable Padded Straps Size: 12 ¾" W x 17" H x 7 ½" D, with 2 ¾" Top Handle Drop and 32" Adjustable Padded Shoulder Back Straps Retired Style: No Pattern Color: Katalina Showers Retired Color: Yes Color Production Years: Jul 2015 - Feb 2016 SKU: 14962-296 UPC: 886003341544 Retail Price: $98.00 This listing is for a NEW with Tags Vera Bradley Backpack. You will receive the Large Colorblock Backpack by Vera Bradley presented in the recently retired Katalina Showers color pattern. Katalina Showers is actually the complementary lining print to the Vera Bradley Katalina Blues pattern. It was introduced as at 2015 Fall color, presented in July 2015, and just retired this year in February. Even though the Katalina Showers color was introduced as a Vera Bradley Fall color, but I think it is one of those great patterns that can be worn year round. The Large Colorblock Backpack is great for any situation. Use for school, work or travel. Hiking, day-outing or a weekend get-away. The water-repellent fabric and roomy interior makes this backpack perfect for camping trips or going to the beach. A very popular style backpack, Vera Bradley sells the Large Colorblock Backpack for $98.00. Katalina Showers "Take a refreshing plunge in the crystal clear waters of blue. Katalina Showers is the complimentary pattern to the Katalina Blues print. Katalina Showers is an unfussy combination of turquoise, lime, and aqua, dripping on a deep blue ground, with the same feeling of fresh coolness like that of a refreshing rain shower. Large Colorblock Backpack "Lighten your load and still have everything your need with this traditional backpack style in lightweight, durable and water-repellent printed polyester. The Large Colorblock Backpack features two roomy main compartments, each with its own double zip closure. There is a front zip pocket with extra organization pockets located behind a front zip compartment. Two exterior side pockets for your water bottles complete this backpack." Details: Lightweight, Water-Repellent PolyesterTop handle32" Adjustable Padded Shoulder StrapsTwo Large CompartmentsLarger Main Compartment contains Zip PocketSmaller Accessories Compartment on Front Zippered pocket with 1 Slip Pocket & 2 Pen Pockets located behind Accessory CompartmentTwo Exterior Side Pockets with Elasticized TopPadded Back for Added ComfortMachine Washable Care Tips: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle, only non-chlorine bleach if needed, line dry Description: This Vera Bradley Large Colorblock Backpack is presented in the Katalina Showers color Pattern. It is constructed out of water repellent polyester material not the traditional quilted fabric. A Large sized Backpack, the Large Colorblock Backpack measures approximately 12 ¾" across the front, it is 17" tall, and 7 ½" deep. The Vera Bradley Colorblock Backpack is a bag with plenty of compartments and pockets. It is a backpack with exceptional style and organizational properties. There are two large main compartments. The larger one is in back and features a zippered pocket on the back wall. This back compartment is 12" wide, 17" tall and 6" deep and is large enough to carry multiple books, binders and folders. The front compartment is also 12" wide and 17" tall , but is not as deep as the back compartment, about 2 inches. Perfect for just about any size laptop. Both compartments feature a 27" two way blue nylon zipper with rubber like Vera Bradley Logo zipper pulls. Zippers go about half way down each side of the bag allowing for a wide opening for easy packing and also to spot what you are looking for at a glance. On the front of the pack is a smaller compartment secured with 9" blue nylon zipper hidden under a flap over top. This compartment is about 2" deep, is 9 ½" across the front and 8 ½" tall. The perfect size for tablets and e-readers, or any go to, must have items, like keys, phone, and such. Located directly behind this compartment is a full length zippered pocket (8 ½"x 8") for keeping even more go-to items easily accessible. This pocket features a slip pocket (4" x 5"), and 2 pen pockets. Pen pockets are big enough to hold large sharpie markers or highlighters. Two very generous sized side slip pockets provide even more storage for water bottles or even a rolled up yoga mat and a smaller umbrella. Each slide slip pocket is 8" deep and 5" wide with and elasticized top allowing room for expansion. The Vera Bradley Large Colorblock Backpack has adjustable padded shoulder back straps plus a top carry handle for added carrying versatility. Straps are 2" wide near the top, they narrow toward the bottom. The adjustable part of the straps are make from blue webbed material and are adjusted with blue plastic slide buckles. Straps measures 32" at the longest setting and 19" at the shortest adjustment. And may be adjusted anywhere in-between for your perfect fit. There is a rubber blue and green cut-out Vera Bradley logo plaque sewn to the front of the back pack.
